Summary: {dr}orange fireball looking UFO flew north then hovered then disappeared
trends: There have been no other sightings in Riverside
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsTwo friends and I were standing outside when I noticed a light in the sky. I said "it looks like that plane is on fire" because I saw a glowing orange ball in the night sky. The light was headed north very steadily. When my friends and I followed the light and stared, the object stopped moving and hovered. After a minute, the light faded and disappeared, never to be seen again. My friends and I were dumbfounded and in awe after this experience.
